mcq.statement: Choose the sentence that uses the correct form of the verb and pronoun: Fahad Mustafa, known for whose acting skills, has won many Filmfare awards., Fahad Mustafa, whose known for his acting skills, have won many Filmfare awards., Fahad Mustafa, who is known for his acting skills, has won many Filmfare awards., Fahad Mustafa, is known for his acting skills, have won many Filmfare awards.

options.a: Fahad Mustafa, known for whose acting skills, has won many Filmfare awards.
options.b: Fahad Mustafa, whose known for his acting skills, have won many Filmfare awards.
options.c: Fahad Mustafa, who is known for his acting skills, has won many Filmfare awards.
